verses.name: Acts 12:22
verses.text: And the people gave a shout, saying, It is the voice of a god, and not of a man.

verses.name: Acts 12:23
verses.text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him, because he gave not God the glory: and he was eaten of worms, and gave up the ghost.

verses.name: Acts 12:24
verses.text: But the word of God grew and multiplied.

verses.name: Acts 12:25
verses.text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem, when they had fulfilled their ministry, and took with them John, whose surname was Mark.
